title: Ranked Placement
body: After finally being bothered to do my ranked provisional, and going 7 wins 3 losses, I end up being placed in bronze 1. This is strange because people who win 3/10 games end up getting placed in the same league as me. Why is this and why does rito hate me?{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We'll probably find a cure for cancer before we figure out how the placements actually work.
